body.name: Puffer Shoulder Bag Puffy Crossbody Purse for Women Middle Tote Bag Lightweight Cotton Padded Hobo Handbag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 【PREMIUM MATERIAL】:The Puffer crossbody bags for women is made of high quality nylon material and padded with cotton, simple shape but unique, which is soft to the touch, Water Resistant and durable.Puffer tote bag is soft and skin-friendly,This Bag is as soft as a pillow.

【LARGE CAPACITY】: Small crossbody bag for women size -11.7 x 2.76 x10.63 in (L x H x W). Light weight: 1.5lbs.The puffy tote bags can hold your daily needs, such as phone, wallet, keys, cosmetics, etc.It has an open pocket and zipper pocket for small items.

【DETACHABLE & ADJUSTABLE STRAP】: One adjustable shoulder strap and one adjustable Puffer shoulder strap, you can adjust it according to your favorite, and use it as a handbag, crossbody bag or shoulder bag.The widened shoulder strap reduces the pressure on the shoulder, soft and comfortable

【UPGRADED CONSTRUCTION】: Featuring a main internal compartment with zipper and foldable magnetic front closure, which effectively prevents items loss and theft.But still easy to open for items to go in and out.

【Perfect Gift】: This casual crossbody purse is suitable for girls, women as a casual travel bag, suitable for school, walking, shopping, working, dating, weekend, hiking, trip, etc. Sweet gift for wife, mom, families, friends and on any significant moments like Christmas, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, birthdays and anniversaries or other special day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I now have the cream and black one and they are my favorite purses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this purse!
reviews.reviewText: This purse is puffy and soft! It’s a great purse for winter but also for any season. It’s not too big or too small. Can be worn as a crossbody or over the shoulder. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute purse, holds a lot. Long adjustable strap. Weird material attracts fuzzies
reviews.reviewText: I love that this purse has a nice long adjustable strap. it looks cute and holds a lot. The material is a little weird and rough/crunchy, it unfortunately attracts every bit of fuzz around me. I wish the material was slightly different but I do love the puffer look. I also like the small change purse included, I use it for cough drops and hand sanitizer but it’s easily large enough for credit cards and a little cash.Purse has two magnetic straps on the flap corners to hold it closed. Lining those magnets up while on the move is a little challenging, but they do stay closed nicely once secured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this purse!
reviews.reviewText: I get so many compliments carrying this purse!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice size bag
reviews.reviewText: Love this cross body bag which my wife bought. She said she really likes it and will probably buy another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this purse
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a purse this color. Love the size of it and how it came with two different straps. Tons of room inside.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Giving it 4 stars only because dog hair sticks to it like crazy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Roomy and billowy!
reviews.reviewText: This super cute purse is extra billowy and chic. I am able to find everything with minimal effort because it is one large section instead of multi-partitioned sections with extra places for things to hide. But it is on the shorter side, so that makes it puff out width-wise. My RFID wallet is on the larger size. Add to that an inhaler case, an OTC migraine bottle, and my phone - and it gets pretty complicated trying to not look like I can't downsize a purse to the essentials (which is the only thing in there). I'm not a fan of short-and-fat, so it's not my ideal daily purse.It comes with an alternate strap, but when I put it on it just looked weird and like it didn't go. The alternate strap is beige and white, so it matches, but it is like an Aztec-style-pattern that looks like you lost the strap that actually goes to the purse and went with whatever you could find that matches. I didn't like it. The strap that matches has an adjustable length with a large silver buckle for adjusting. That got tricky for me, though because the purse is short and stout and my body-type is pear (36-36-46 | 5'4 | 145lbs). So, if I lengthen the strap, it hits my hips and makes them appear wider. As a result, I needed to keep the strap short enough to have the purse sit at the small of my waist. But that caused a persistent fight between the strap and my coat lapel, which kept pushing it out.Extra adjustments aside, it's a really nice purse. It is thick and feels like it would be insulated enough to use during Winter months without worrying that your goodies are going to freeze inside if you are outside too long. And it goes with the majority of casual and business-casual outfits. So, I recommend it, albeit with all the caveats stated above. LOL
